subject: Hockey, Ice
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: If Mike Modano plays a 21st season in the N.H.L., it will not be with the Dallas Stars. Modano will not be offered a contract by the Stars when free agency opens Thursday.
snippet: If Mike Modano plays a 21st season in the N.H.L., it will not be with the Dallas Stars. Modano will not be offered a contract by the Stars when free agency opens Thursday.
